about_the_game:
.

Experience a girl in "your room" with overwhelming reality with the latest MR function of MetaQuest3!


This game is equipped with the most powerful MR features, "Scene Mesh" and "DepthAPI", which were first introduced in MetaQuest3!

What is Scene Mesh: The feature that allows you to scan and physically interfere with the shape of your room and furniture.
It is possible to make a girl lie on a bed or sit on a chair in your room!

DepthAPI: A feature that reflects the back and forth relationship between reality and virtuality in real time.
It enhances the experience of having the girl in your room!

These features allow you to experience the presence of a girl in "your room" with overwhelming reality!

Of course, pass-through and hand tracking are also supported!

Playable on devices other than Meta, such as Vive and Valve Index!

*Functions such as pass-through are not available for non-Meta devices, so the 3D model of the room will be used as the background.
Please check the details in the demo version.


This product works with most VR headsets such as Vive HTC, Valve Index, and Pico4, but please make sure to check it works with the trial version before purchasing.
Scene mesh and DepthAPI work only with Meta Quest3. Also, you need to set them up in advance. Please see the manual for details.

Many characters!




12 characters built in as default!
More characters will be added with DLC!

Various Naughty Features!





* Sleeping Mode
The girls will be still and deeply asleep in this mode.
Put them in the perfect position, kiss them, fuck them, creampie them, do anything you want!
By using the Quest3's new mixed reality features, you can really experience what it's like to have a girl that won't wake up in your room!

* Motion Mode
On top of the sex animations you've come to expect, we've readied various less naughty motions such as sitting in a chair, squatting and more!

* Body Customization
Turn the girls into giantesses or shrink them to a tiny size!
Seeing a gigantic girl fill your room is quite the sight!
And you can make them tiny too! Put them on a table and bask in their cuteness!

* Breast Size Customization
You can also change the size of her boobs!




* Summon multiple characters (and cocks!) at once
Summon various characters at once and enjoy the harem of your dreams!
And as an improvement over the previous game, you can now summon multiple cocks as well!
You can now have sex with multiple girls...at once!

* Automatic Climax and Ejaculation
Ejaculate automatically during insertion or while receiving fellatio.
The girls will climax automatically, too!


* Real-time Breast Physics
Realistic breast physics brought to you by the most powerful jiggle engine of them all, MagicaCloth2!
Enjoy jiggling to a detail you've never seen before!

* Breast fondling
Freely toy with their breasts!

* Fellatio, Insertion, Creampies, Cross-Section
Of course, everything from blowjobs to a cross-section view are all in here!
You can see how you fill them up with your seed!
Knock them up all you want!

Credits

もか: キュビクローゼット様 / オリジナル3Dモデル「萌」
いちか: ジンゴ様 / オリジナル3Dモデル「イメリス」
せいな: ジンゴ様 / オリジナル3Dモデル「セレスティア」

This game contains sexual content, adult content, and other content not intended for all ages.
It does NOT include depictions of alcohol abuse, violence, self-harm, or suicide.
